name: 9.4 "Where Nobody Knows Your Name" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Cliff stick his gum?
questions.explanation:
on the bar.

	Norm found the gum when he stuck his arm on it and it stuck to his new suit jacket. He said that it didn't interfere with his range of movement (that is he could drink beer with no problem) so he just left it there and kept drinking.

questions.text: Who was afraid of Indian summer?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	She said that she always got pregnant during Indian summers. She told Sam, "I can't let any guy touch me, talk to me, or see me or I"ll be shooting kids out like a Pez dispenser."

questions.text: Who did Carla call a hunk?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	She saw Cliff from the backside and didn't recognize him. She blamed the Indian summer for calling him a hunk. She said that that year was the worst.

questions.text: What did Woody tell his mother on the phone that made him have to wash his mouth out with soap the first time?
questions.correct: It was really Miss Howe who was having ...you know with Mr. Colcord.
options: It was really Miss Howe who was having sex with Mr. Colcord.
It was really Miss Howe who did the wild thing with Mr. Colcord.
It was really Miss Howe who made love to Mr. Colcord.
questions.explanation:
It was really Miss Howe who was having ...you know with Mr. Colcord.

	Rebecca apologized to Woody. Woody told her maybe next time she'd think of the consequences of her actions.

questions.text: What word did Woody say that caused his mother to tell him to wash his mouth out with soap the second time?
questions.explanation:
font.

	His mother miss heard him and thought he said the F-word. As he went to the bathroom he said to Rebecca, "Thanks a lot Miss Howe."

Rebecca.

	She pulled the TV off the wall. Sam was upset with her saying  the corporation owned the bar for 3 years and you never broke anything, but he had the bar for 3 weeks and you pull my TV off the wall."

questions.text: Who was going to be on "The Arsenio Hall Show"?
questions.explanation:
Jean Marie.

	Arsenio said she was the woman Robin "really gave it up for". When he said he would "kick it with Jean Marie" Rebecca pulled the TV off the wall and said "I'm the one who should be kicking it."

questions.text: Why did Sam tell Robin he couldn't hit even though he has been a professional athlete?
questions.correct: He pitched for the American League
options: He pitched for the National League
He had a sore wrist that day.
questions.explanation:
He pitched for the American League.

	In the American League there is a designated hitter who hits for the pitcher. The pitchers don't take batting practice so they usually do not hit well. There have been some exceptions to that, but as a general rule, pitchers are bad hitters.

questions.text: What did Frasier say he learned to ignore?
options: the insane conversations at the bar
questions.explanation:
cries for help.

	Frasier is always making jokes like that about his job. Sometimes, one wonders if he really is joking.

questions.text: How long did Woody say he had in the sun?
questions.explanation:
3 hours.

	It was about 100 degrees when Rebecca sent Woody out to get a newspaper. He said he would have been back sooner but he thought he passed out at some point while he was out there.
